Enerwave in-wall switch¶

Enerwave Z-Wave ZW15S Wireless Lighting 3-Way Switch, Works with Alexa Voice Control, NEUTRAL REQUIRED¶

Specification¶

  • Power: 120V, 60Hz
  • Incandescent: 1000W
  • Ballast: 1200VA
  • Resistive: 1800W (15A)
  • Motor: 1/2 HP
  • Z-wave frequency: 908.42 MHz
  • Operating temp: 32 ~ 104 oF
  • Range: up to 100 feet line of sign

Inclusion/Exclusion to/from a network¶

  1. Put controller to Inclusion/Exclusion mode
  2. Push bottom or bottom paddle once to reset device
  3. Wait for confirmation from Venus/Titan and then push once again
  4. Wait for controller completes inclusion/exclusion process

Configuration description¶

  1. LED light specify

    • Parameter: 1 (0x01)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:
      1. 0 = LED on when light off
      2. 1 = LED on when light on

    • Default: 0

  2. Invert switch

    • Parameter: 2 (0x02)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:
      1. 0 = ON at the top and OFF at the bottom
      2. 1 = ON at the bottom and OFF at the top

    • Default: 0
